title: Equipment Inspection Record
description: Schema representing an equipment inspection report, including metadata, inspection summary, and detailed component evaluations.

company_name.description: The name of the company conducting the inspection, as shown at the top of the document.

company_address.description: The address of the company, including street, city, and state.

company_phone.description: The contact phone number for the company.

inspection_title.description: The title of the inspection document, typically 'EQUIPMENT INSPECTION'.

machine.description: The name or type of the machine being inspected.

serial_number.description: The serial number of the machine under inspection.

inspection_grade.description: The overall assessment or grade given to the machine after inspection.

inspection_summary.description: A narrative summary describing the inspection process, findings, and recommendations.

component_evaluations.description: A list of evaluations for each major component or system of the equipment, as detailed in the inspection table.

component.description: The name of the equipment component or system evaluated.

condition.description: A qualitative assessment of the component's condition, e.g., 'Good'.

passed.description: Indicates whether the component passed inspection, typically represented by a checkmark or similar notation.

inspected_by.description: The name of the individual who performed the inspection.

inspection_date.description: The date the inspection was completed, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD.
